{"id":173337198,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"4 years, 5 months","timestamp":1535921347,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"22 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/173337198/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find Pivot Index","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\n    public int pivotIndex(int[] nums) {\n        if (nums.length == 0) {\n            return -1;\n        }\n        int sum = 0, leftSum = 0, rightSum = 0;\n        for (int i = 0; i < nums.length; i++) {\n            sum += nums[i];\n        }\n        rightSum = sum;\n        for(int i = 0; i < nums.length; i++) {\n            leftSum += nums[i];\n            if (leftSum == rightSum) {\n                return i;\n            }\n            rightSum -= nums[i];\n        }\n        return -1;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-pivot-index","has_notes":false}
